step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your elbows straighter when stretching your arms overhead. Also, focus on opening your fingers wider.
In step 2, ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and your fingers are spread wide. Aim for a more relaxed exhale.
During step 3, focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together more. Try to make a tighter fist and inhale deeply.
For step 4, ensure your arms are fully stretched back overhead and your fingers are spread wide as you exhale and relax.
In step 5, try to keep your elbows straighter when stretching your arms overhead. Also, focus on opening your fingers wider.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms fully overhead with fingers wide, then make a tight fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Keep up the good work!
